signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.subtitle: Welcome back! Please enter your details to continue your green journey.
signIn.emailRequired: Email is required and must be valid
signIn.description: Discover the joy of plants and create your own natural space.

client-signup.title: Client Sign Up
client-signup.name: Name
client-signup.welcomeParagraph1: We are here to pave the way for you towards a unique and exceptional experience.
client-signup.welcomeParagraph2: Please fill in your details carefully, as each request is a step towards building a relationship of trust and respect.
client-signup.welcomeParagraph3: After submitting your request, our dedicated team will carefully review it to ensure quality service.
client-signup.welcomeParagraph4: We believe that every activated account is the beginning of a new opportunity and mutual growth.
client-signup.welcomeParagraph5: For any inquiries or assistance, our team is ready to support you anytime.

massages.passwordPattern: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one special character
massages.phoneNumberPattern: Phone Number must be exactly 10 digits

homepage.title: Every plant tells a story.. Let's plant beauty in the corners of your home
homepage.Who We Are title: At Ghosn, we believe every plant brings life and beauty to any space. We're more than a plant store — we're a green passion and a growing community of nature lovers.
homepage.What We Offer title: We handpick a beautiful selection of indoor & outdoor plants, succulents, and elegant care tools — all delivered with love and ready to thrive with you.
homepage.How We Deliver title: With fast, reliable delivery and professional drivers, your plants arrive fresh and on time — to your home, office, or as a thoughtful gift.
homepage.clienttitle: Don't just be a shopper...be part of the Ghosn community and cultivate your passion with us!
homepage.drivertitle: Become a Ghosn Plant Ambassador - join us as a driver and make a difference with every delivery!
